text: 1. Open the zip folder and navigate to src folder.  Install Node JS with latest STABLE Version with cmd 'npm install -g'
2. Install Angular CLI by running the command in cmd 'npm install -g @angular/cl'
3. Install the application using command 'npm install'
4. If there are no errors, applicaiton will be automatically served in localhost:4200
This app is built on top of Angular 6. Angular installation is required to run it locally.
Site consists of 3 tabs => Home Page, Search Page(actual app), Observations(for documentation)
Clicking on button leads in home page leads to Search page
